``chemotools`` is a **Python toolkit** designed for **spectral preprocessing**, built to easily integrate with the widely adopted ``scikit-learn`` API and the broader **Python machine learning ecosystem**, leveraging state-of-the-art infrastructure available within the Python environment.

Our mission is to **empower development scientists** with the tools they need to create **production-ready chemometric models**. ``chemotools`` offers a **flexible, intuitive environment** that streamlines the **development and deployment** of these modelsâ€”making it easier to **standardize workflows** and focus on solving **real-world problems**.
